title: CSL Notification 2025 - Apply Online for 07 Commissioning Engineer Posts
description: The Cochin Shipyard Limited (CSL) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 07 Commissioning Engineer and METI Hostel Superintendent Wardens Posts. Interested and eligibile candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their 10th, Diploma in Electrical, Electronics, and Mechanical Engineering can apply for the CSL Notification 2025 . The interested applicants can apply in online mode.
